title: 'Good' Just Isn't Enough
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Why Ja Morant is great and KAT isn't, 'quit on the job' voicemails!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones discusses the latest in the NBA Playoffs, including why Ja Morant of the Grizzlies is one of his favorite players (0:59), and why Karl-Anthony Towns of the Timberwolves is one of his biggest disappointments (16:04). Plus, an IYHH including corrective surgery that can make "short kings" tall (27:29), and your voicemails from when you "quit" your job in the middle of a shift (43:28)!


Miss our YouTube exclusive edition of #UnblockmeBo? Check it out here! https://bit.ly/3KEcwQa

  1. @elamin88 says limb-lengthening surgery has become increasingly popular for men: https://bit.ly/3KCrLJd
  2. @anniegowen says Texas residents sue county for removing books, and firing a librarian: https://wapo.st/3w1GLuP
  3. @jjsahadi says Fidelity will soon offer bitcoin as an option in 401(k)s: https://cnn.it/3KCcQPa
